Uses of Interface
org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.Request

  • Packages that use Request 
    Package Description
    org.ctoolkit.restapi.client  

    • Uses of Request in org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

      Subinterfaces of Request in org.ctoolkit.restapi.client 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ListRetrievalRequest<T>
      The extended Request to provide retrieval specific API to work with list of resources.
      interface  PayloadRequest<T>
      The extended Request to provide additional flow actions for requests having payload.
      interface  RetrievalRequest<T>
      The extended Request to provide single retrieval specific API.
      interface  SimpleRequest<T>
      The Request API for light request doesn't require any specific configuration.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add parameter to the request.
      Request<T> Request.add(String name, String value)
      Add optional parameter to the request.

      The type of the answer expected as a result of the remote call execution.
      Request<T> Request.configWith(Properties properties)
      Apply specific properties as request configuration to this call.
      Request<T> Request.forLang(Locale locale)
      Config request with optional locale.
      Request<T> IdentificationAction.identifiedBy(Identifier identifier)
      Creates request with given identification of the resource.
      Request<T> IdentificationAction.identifiedBy(Long identifier)
      Creates request with given identification of the resource.

      Creates request with given identification of the resource.
